title: Layers of Fear (Early Access)
description:
Layers of Fear (Early Access)
Install instructions:
1. Extract release
2. Run "PlayLayersOfFear.exe"
3. Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: Layers of Fear
Genre: Adventure, Indie, Early Access
Developer: Bloober Team SA 
Publisher: Bloober Team SA	
Release Date: Aug 27, 2015
About This Game:
Layers of Fear is a psychedelic horror that will keep you on-edge for the reminder of the game. Delve deep into the mind of an insane painter and discover the secret of his madness, as you walk through a constantly shifting house.
Heavily inspired by the masterpiece paintings from the past centuries, and the architecture and dÃ©cor from the XIX century. Layers of Fear is a truly unique experience, where each move of the camera can change your surroundings.
Layer by layer uncover the visions, fears and horrors that entwine the protagonist and finish the masterpiece he has strived so long to create.
Game Features:
- A psychedelic horror game where each turn of the camera may change the look of your surroundings.
- Deep insight into the madness that entwines a human being.
- Inspired by the masterpiece paintings from the past centuries, and the architecture and dÃ©cor from the XIX century. 
- A thick atmosphere that will make you feel on-edge throughout the whole game.

System Requirements:
MINIMUM: 
OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 
Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q8400 
Memory: 2/4 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti 1GB 
DirectX: Version 11 
Hard Drive: 3 GB available space

RECOMMENDED: 
OS: Windows 7 
Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 Ti 2GB 
DirectX: Version 11 
Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
